description: This file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot backend application. It includes endpoints for greeting, providing API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller exposing endpoints for greeting, health check, documentation redirect, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message at the root URL ('/').

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI documentation, preserving the original request's scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a simple health status response.
